sentences.sContent: Momentous events are taking place in the US.
sentences.sCn: 美国正在发生重大事件。

sentences.sContent: His colleagues all recognized that this was a momentous occasion .
sentences.sCn: 他的同事都认识到这是一个重要时刻。

sentences.sContent: one of the most momentous days in British sport
sentences.sCn: 英国体育事业最重要的日子之一

words.tran: 重要，契机；瞬间；重要时刻；指定时刻

trans.tranCn: 极为重要的， 重大的
trans.tranOther: a momentous event, change, or decision is very important because it will have a great influence on the future
